para.emphasis: Leading-edge projection-based reduced order models (pROMs) for dynamical systems in science and engineering.

detaileddescription.para: You landed on the documentation of the Python bindings library!
If this is a mistake, please go back to the project website.

sect1.title: Get Started
sect1.para: If you want to have a full build:

exportCXX=<path-to-your-C++-compiler> pip3install--no-binary:all:pressio4py
Or you can try pip directly:

pip3installpressio4py
And then you can look at the demos and/or tutorials both in progress.

sect2.title: License and Citation
sect2.para: The full license is available here.
We are working on publishing this: you can find our arXiv preprint at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.07798

sect2.title: Questions?
sect2.para: Find us on Slack: https://pressioteam.slack.com or open an issue on github.
